Class AV.GeoPoint

Represents a latitude / longitude point that may be associated with a key in a AVObject or used as a reference point for geo queries. This allows proximity-based queries on the key.

Only one key in a class may contain a GeoPoint.

Example:

  var point = new AV.GeoPoint(30.0, -20.0);
  var object = new AV.Object("PlaceObject");
  object.set("location", point);
  object.save();


Defined in: av.js.

Class Summary
Constructor Attributes Constructor Name and Description
 
AV.GeoPoint(arg1, arg2)
Creates a new GeoPoint with any of the following forms:
  new GeoPoint(otherGeoPoint)
  new GeoPoint(30, 30)
  new GeoPoint([30, 30])
  new GeoPoint({latitude: 30, longitude: 30})
  new GeoPoint()  // defaults to (0, 0)
Method Summary
Method Attributes Method Name and Description
<static>  
AV.GeoPoint.current(options)
Creates a GeoPoint with the user's current location, if available.
 
kilometersTo(point)
Returns the distance from this GeoPoint to another in kilometers.
 
milesTo(point)
Returns the distance from this GeoPoint to another in miles.
 
radiansTo(point)
Returns the distance from this GeoPoint to another in radians.
 
toJSON()
Returns a JSON representation of the GeoPoint, suitable for AV.
Class Detail
AV.GeoPoint(arg1, arg2)
Creates a new GeoPoint with any of the following forms:
  new GeoPoint(otherGeoPoint)
  new GeoPoint(30, 30)
  new GeoPoint([30, 30])
  new GeoPoint({latitude: 30, longitude: 30})
  new GeoPoint()  // defaults to (0, 0)

arg1

Method Detail
<static> AV.GeoPoint.current(options)
Creates a GeoPoint with the user's current location, if available. Calls options.success with a new GeoPoint instance or calls options.error.
Parameters:
{Object} options
An object with success and error callbacks.
